author: twomin
title: 2MIN REVIEW Integrated Platform
description: Voters need an integrated platform for accessing Catalyst's contents which are filtered, analyzed by 2Min Review.
solution: Building an integrated platform and mobile application for accessing Catalyst's contents which are filtered, analyzed by 2Min Review
experience: The 2Min Review team and ADAboys LAB consist of members with experience in application development, community development, CA, vCA.
